t:
as I sit on the pavement in the cold, I see a shooting star striking across the sky.
Being homeless, I wish for four walls around me and a roof above my head.

I was really surprised when my wish was granted, but even more so,
when I realized I had forgot to wish for any door or windows.
c:
Where are you trapped?


#Collab and share what are you doing this #latesaturdaynight  #YourQuoteAndMine
Collaborating with YourQuote Baba





#homeless #wish #shootingstar #trapped #noescape
